website_summaries.verdict: Every woman wearing the Skechers Gratis – Going Places will undoubtedly go places with the lightweight faux nubuck and mesh material, shock absorbing midsole, and flexible high traction sole.  These features paired with the Air-Cooled Memory Foam insole makes this sneaker extremely comfortable for long runs and walks. The lightweight shoe is also convenient to wear on and off with its slip-on features that are a real value for money as each pair only costs $65.
pros: Several users commented that the Memory foam insole makes the shoe extremely comfortable
The smooth faux nubuck and mesh upper material offer ventilation
These help make the inside of the shoe cool and airy all throughout the day, according to many customers
The bungee-style stretch laces and slip-on design make this ideal as a travel footwear
Many buyers find ease in wearing and removing the shoes because of its bungee stretched lace slip-on design, stretchable rope laces and pull tab at front
A considerable number of wearers find the Skechers Gratis - Going Places lightweight
Majority of users find the shoe perfect for running errands and activities needing a quick run or walk
The shock absorbing midsoles help a lot in cushioning every step without the feet feeling tired after hours of walking according to several comments
The Skechers Gratis - Going Places construction remains stable and durable despite its lightweight material
Some customers find the outsole comfortably flexible to a wide range of movements and still maintain high traction on the ground
cons: Some commented that the Skechers Gratis - Going Places could have been perfect except when it is raining as water could seep into the mesh material
A few comments were noted on the mesh material wearing out at the heel affecting the shape of the shoe
The rubber sole easily chips off on hard surfaces and show signs of wearing out after a few months of regular use
The lack of arch support bothers some users with pronation problems

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe for Walking - Suggest Order Next Size Larger
customer_reviews.text: I walk a lot, and have trouble finding walking shoes that don't cause blisters. This is my 3rd pair of these shoes, and they work perfect for me. I normally wear a size 7 shoe, but in athletic shoes (including these) I wear a 71/2, thus my fit rating of "somewhat small" as I think these may be small for someone who is a true 71/2.
customer_reviews.author: Kat K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe for long walks - hills and all!  A+++
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for a trip to Italy where I knew there was to be considerable walking. Honestly - the most comfortable shoes I've ever worn. They were lightweight, cool and not a bit uncomfortable - EVEN RIGHT OUT OF THE BOX! Will be using this as my go-to sneaker brand from here on out. Crazy good shoes at a ridiculously low price ($25.00). Thanks Amazon and thanks Sketchers
customer_reviews.author: Romeyd

customer_reviews.title: Cute and low profile
customer_reviews.text: I think these look lower profile than the description. Also, I have wide feet and a high instep and these fit great. I am excited to wear these with shorts and capris this summer. I normally wear an 8.5 but I usually order 9 in Skechers. They are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Mac

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, cute and lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: I have plantar fasciitis so I am usually stuck in clunky athletic tennies. I was thrilled when I got these slimmer profile shoe and was able to wear them long extended periods of time without much pain. The padding in the shoe is very cushiony and the mesh top allows your feet to breathe better. I ordered a 2nd pair immediately and am considering ordering a third pair for future use. The price jumped from $38 to $49 however so I will wait and see.
customer_reviews.author: Weema

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Shoe
customer_reviews.text: From the first time I slipped them on, it was love at first step. I am more than happy with this shoe. I bought them for an up coming trip and they are so light weight they will easily slip into my suitcase and not add tot he load. I have worn them two full days without any problems with blisters, etc. and know they will offer the support I am looking for also. My friend bought a pair and she too is happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: 41spots

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as dressy sneakers for slacks. I was pleasantly surprised as they are slip ons, not ties to knot and they're pretty. I have plantar in my feet and a heel spur and can't say enough about this brand of shoe. You can put the ortho things in all of them. I love this brand and better still love not going to a shoe store to purchase them.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie L. Kury

customer_reviews.title: Nice and snug pleasing to the eye
customer_reviews.text: They are pretty. But they are snug. I'd say they are 8 1/2 not 9. My feet are 8 1/2 and when I wear that size my toes rub the inside of the shoes. And that is what is happening. But that is ok. They feel nice on my feet. I wore them today and my socks chafed my little toes. Very painful. I bought another pair. This time size 9.5. the size 9 fit more like size 8.5. my big toe finally poked through the size 9. So so far these new ones feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective shoe
customer_reviews.text: I usually LOVE Skechers and these are my favorite pair. I had a pair that I completely wore out and I purchased these as a replacement. Now, after just a few weeks, the inner structure of the right heel has completely broken down so when I walk it feels like my right foot is falling inward. So disappointed!! These are super cute and super comfortable shoes, but not when they are defective!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Are these authentic Skechers?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in black since I owned a white pair that I bought directly from Skechers and which are extremely comfortable and perfect for walking. This pair in black does not match the fit in the same size 7.5 shoe that I have in white. The shoe is more narrow, there is very little support and the sole seems thinner. There is also a fabric coating on the bottom which appears to be ready to peel off and I've worn them twice. I suspect these are not authentic Skechers and this may be a case of you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Annie B.

customer_reviews.title: very cute walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: I loved the style of this slip on.... but as in the past.... I do have a somewhat narrow foot which I typically choose shoe strings so I an tighten a shoe. I decided to try this one and memories of yester'year came back to me.... the shoe is a slip on and it cannot be tightened. My foot is unfortunately just a little too narrow for this shoe.... there was some slippage so I choose to return. I love the shoe though!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these!! I got the white and they are so nice! Im a caregiver and needed new white shoes. They have leather on them and love how you can slip your foot in. I got a size 9. I usually wear an 8.5. They are a bit tight on one foot but i think that foot swells a bit...overall they fit true to size...sketchers run a little small...if your foot is wide get a wide width. I also wear a thin sock...
customer_reviews.author: Tina M.

customer_reviews.title: These are the best!
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved Sketchers and these shoes do not disappoint! The fit like a glove (I have narrow feet) and when I put them on the first time, they were just right. In my case, no need for inserts or wait time for them to stretch out a bit to make them comfy. I am a nurse, up on my feet all day and I wore these 8-10 hours the first day and had no problem. Just love my Sketchers and I will be buying another pair in another color just because I am so tickled with the way they fit!
customer_reviews.author: K. Page

customer_reviews.title: Poor shoe construction
customer_reviews.text: It made me sad to return these because they fit like a glove! However, the workmanship of the shoes was "shotty". I have been successfully purchasing Skechers for years now, and I have been very pleased with them. This particular pair, however, had poor stitching up around the toe area and there was a single layer of thin fabric on many areas. It was so thin, I could see my fingers through it. Since I would like to get some wear out of the shoes I buy, I opted to return these and hope to find a pair of white slip on Skechers that are more durable.

customer_reviews.title: Love my Skechers Gratis Going Places shoes
customer_reviews.text: I spend a lot of time on concrete floors -- and wanted a shoe easy to get on and off but comfortable and healthy for my feet and legs -- this shoe is great -- so happy with it. Have tried various shoes in shoe stores and just finally gave up and saw these -- ordered -- am happy. I have to wear the moderate weight footies or low sport socks with them. For my foot, there is a seam that rubs the small toe of each foot but that is the only thing I have to do for these to be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: capricorn60us

customer_reviews.title: Best "boat" shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are great for boating because of the white soles (leaves no marks on the - white - bow &/or aft deck; have a unusually good gripping action on wet (deck) surfaces plus fit & feel perfect on my feet. As "first mate" for my husband/captain I handle the lines when leaving & returning to our dock. It is essential that I have sure footing during the process ... and leave no marks!
customer_reviews.author: Twilight

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair. I've had to retire the first pair, not because they're wore out, but because they're too dirty to wear at work. That's the only drawback. But the comfort level is through the roof. Since I work in a doctor's office, I need shoes that are comfortable. They are like wearing no shoes which is what I prefer. If you need lots of support though, you might try another pair. I work at a desk all day. My older pair are great to slip on for a walk with the dogs. Since they like to go through all terrains, my shoes got too dirty for work. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: vicki campbell

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoes I have ever tried.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of Sketchers and loved them. I decided I wanted another pair for walking. I am NOT the type of person that exercises but as silly as this sounds, these shoes have made me start walking on my lunch break. They are so comfortable. They really do inspire me to be more active. I initially tried these on at a shoe store and they were $20 MORE than on amazon. If you are just getting into walking or just looking for an amazing shoe for every day use I would recommend these. The only downside is they make me hate wearing any of my other shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Nice, basic shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for moderate amounts of walking. Wore them today to an inside festival at work with kackis and they were great. Not sure I would wear them if doing a lot of walking and standing. Have plantar fasciitis and would wear something with more support for that. But, these are a nice go to show that looks great and is overall comfortable. They are also slip on and that's a plus. I think they run just a tad bit short in length, but fit well otherwise. May want to consider going up half size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable!!! I have them in both black and white. This is actually my second pair of the black ones. I wore the first ones out. We have annual passes to our zoo and SeaWorld and I wear them there at least two weekends a month. Also wore them for our week long trip to Disney. I've never had a blister or pain from them! Highly recommend these for lots of walking!
customer_reviews.author: Toni Miller

customer_reviews.title: the most comfortable shoes i've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews of anything because I'm lazy but these shoes have been so comfortable since the minute I put them on. I am about 20 weeks pregnant and wanted to get some comfortable walking shoes for an upcoming vacation, and these are everything I could have asked for. They are light but have plenty of support, have a nice squishy sole, and I couldn't be happier. The only thing I will mention is that they don't have fantastic traction on slippery surfaces, so if you're going to go walking on a lot of slick wet stone these might not be best, but for city walking and daily use they are absolutely amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars for both style and comfort!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a very satisfied Skechers customer for several years. There are so many different styles from which to choose. They are a flattering addition to just about any style of casual clothing. As a retired child care provider I was constantly on my feet. I have had several pairs of Skechers over the years. They are a great walking shoe, too.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Mabelitini

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: For me the toe box was a little smaller than I what I needed, but that could be just me. After a day or two of breaking in these are so comfortable for my job. I walk on asphalt and concrete all day (approximately 5-10 miles a day). I have a torn tendon and really needed the arch support and the all around support for my feet. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Deb's stuff

customer_reviews.title: Sketchers are the best!!
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing Sketchers since the 90s and it is because I love their style and perfectly snug fit to the foot. Plus I'm happy they have added the pillow comfort cushion to the soles of the shoes inside over the years! Purchased these for my Spain trip overseas and had to walk many, many miles per day. I brought 2 other pairs of shoes with me, but only wore these because they never let me down! :)
customer_reviews.author: SpiritualHealer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Stylish, No breaking them in!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t decide between these and the sketcher no trouble. I’m glad I got these. This sketcher walking tennis shoe is great and a nice looking tennis shoe with a silver trim above the sole. Very cool. I ordered white so I could wear it with everything. It fits exactly as expected without socks. I wear a 9 and ordered a 9. No tying laces, it has the bungee cord tie. The memory foam really is a great cushion for your foot too. I didn’t need to break these in at all. Taking these on my trip out west. These maybe my favorite tennis shoe yet!! Get these they are truly the best comfort!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Hesner

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Made in China. Says size 37, not 6 1/2. Too wide flops in my feet when I walk. Was going to buy several pair if these fit but the didn’t and they were made in China. Cheaply made!
customer_reviews.author: BD Texas

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit and may not be true to size
customer_reviews.text: I have the exact same shoe in the same size that I purchased from a local retailer and when it came time to replace, I ordered this pair. However, these were very tight and did not fit at all like the others. I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable, not bulky, super lightweight and nice looking. I love them. I've had at least 5 pairs of this exact style and they always fit right, and for the price they're awesome, I will keep ordering these. they last at least several months wearing them every day to work. I would definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle P

customer_reviews.title: shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first pair of skechers for work3 years ago because I was on my feet all day and walking about 5 miles a day. I needed something with good padding in the shoe. I loved this shoe but eventually the pad wore down so now I needed another pair.
customer_reviews.author: qc

customer_reviews.title: My third pair of these!
customer_reviews.text: solid shoe, nice and white (lawn bowling requirement). this is my third pair of these. They are no longer made by skechers so I was glad to get them online as there's no option right now for trying on shoes if I was going to switch to different model.
customer_reviews.author: M. Woodyard

customer_reviews.title: fell apart
customer_reviews.text: After having these shoes for less than 4 months and maybe wearing them once or twice a week, the toe split wide open on the left shoe. I work at a desk all day so they were not over used or used in a rough manner. Major disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My second pair and still great!
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of these Skechers for 4-5 years. They are just now wearing out and becoming uncomfortable. I have newer Skechers, too, but I wanted another pair of these black ones. I was quite pleasantly surprised to find them here on Amazon, even with the same side design! The newer Skechers have a different pattern. I ordered them in my regular size of 9M and they fit right out of the box, just like the old pair when they were new. I'm thrilled to have another pair of what is to me the best running-around daily shoes ever!
customer_reviews.author: GhostWriteHer

customer_reviews.title: Almost but not quite.
customer_reviews.text: I am only giving them a four star rating as I ordered a B width which is fine but for some reason known only to the company they seem to be making the heel area wider than usual in the memory foam. I have a pair I bought about a year and a half ago is memory foam and relaxed fit and is great. This pair of medium is good except the heel slips so I guess I am going to have to buy some of those sticky things to put in them, and pray it solves the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Sequin38

customer_reviews.title: Not a good Sketcher
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Sketchers ever since they came out & first bad pair I ever got. The right side of the left shoe is weak & my foot falls over. Hard to walk in & I know it's the shoe. I have never had this problem with any shoe I have ever had. It's a defective shoe & that does happen.
customer_reviews.author: Linda McMurtrey

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable.  A half size too big for me
customer_reviews.text: I have the same pair in beige, size 7 so I ordered the same size for this pair. They were a bit too big so I gave them to my mom and bought another pair in store. This is my second pair. They are so comfortable and machine washable.
customer_reviews.author: ChargerNP

customer_reviews.title: Air Cool Memory A Plus in South Louisiana Heat
customer_reviews.text: I did have to go up a 1/2 size for extra comfort, but the lower size could have been worn. I have polyneuropathy with the most pain in my feet and the memory foam took care of that.. I wore these shoes right out of the box all day and no pain !!! These are my first pair of Skechers but they won't be the last.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Comfort plus style
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these in white for my 97 year old mother and she loves them! The fit her narrow foot wonderfully and there is nothing to tie, just slide them on and go! She wanted white shoes for summer and there aren't too many fashionable and comfortable white shoes out there. I am so glad I found these!
customer_reviews.author: rebus

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love Sketchers. This is my 3rd pair of same shoes. I have weird feet with swelling. And I'm on them alot. These are perfect. Super comfy, easy to clean. Not too tight. I even hiked 6miles in them. Only thing they smell quickly so I have to wash the inserts frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are very comfortable, but they did hurt my feet a little ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable, but they did hurt my feet a little the first day I wore them. It wasn't unbearable, though, and I do like the shoes. I ordered a size 6 since most size 6 shoes provide me with enough toe room, but the size 6s fit more like a 5.5, so I'd recommend ordering a size up if you want enough toe room.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic csr service
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my sister and she said they are perfect, and loves them! We had a problem with delivery of first pair by me writing st when it was rd but this company was fabulous and refunded me the original payment. Thank you for such great service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and attractive
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. This is my second pair so this review is based on the first pair. I have severe arthritis and have trouble finding shoes and sneakers that fit well and look good but don't hurt. These fit the bill with no break in or adjustment required. They are very lightweight and attractive looking and don't make your my size 8 feet look huge like some sketchers seem to. The only reason I didn't give them a 5 is because the toe area is very thin and it will only be a matter of time before (hopefully not too soon) my big toe pokes through.
customer_reviews.author: TeriS

customer_reviews.title: Shoes fit like crap, could not send them back
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for Friend and she didn’t hand them back to me till it was past time to return them I contacted the company and they said it was too late I am surprised I could’ve taken them anywhere I guess but I was hurt that they would not make an excuse the lady is 94 years old and still buying their type of shoe
customer_reviews.author: Patricia VanNorden

customer_reviews.title: Maybe order 1/2 size larger.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying a sz 9 for years. I just bought a gray pair in a store and they fit fine. These were short in the toe box so I’m wondering if sizing is changing. But they are attractive. I just won’t use these as “all day” shoes since after a while my toes hurt
customer_reviews.author: Juju

customer_reviews.title: Not this style ever again
customer_reviews.text: Low quality for Sketchers. Came with a flaw on the fabric which looks like dirt. I will never buy this style again. I have worn Sketchers for years because of the fit (kind of narrow on some styles which I desperately need), quality, and comfort. These shoes are comfortable, but that's all. They aren't wearing well, and again, they look dirty, ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are awesome
customer_reviews.text: My feet tend to swell, I have the dexterity of a hoofed animal, and I can't wear anything too heavy due to some neurological issues. These shoes were exactly what I needed and hoped for. They are so comfortable, support my feet in just the right places, no shoelaces to fumble over, and I haven't tripped over my feet yet. Love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Online Shopping - a blessing for me!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have ordered shoes online and delighted with the results. New shoes long overdue because my mobility issues made it difficult to use a brick and mortar store. Amazon - you are the greatest thing that has happened for physically handicapped persons since the invention of wheelchairs and rollators. Thank You! These shoes fit well and look great. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Movie Lover

customer_reviews.title: cute shoe but no support
customer_reviews.text: Loved the way this shoe looked and felt. Till I walked in them. No support on the side of shoe, my foot rolled in, instead of being held in place.
customer_reviews.author: thunder woman

customer_reviews.title: True to fit and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like to try Skechers on in the store but due to Covid restrictions when I purchased them I decided to give it a chance and purchase online. Glad I did. I wear an 8 and these were true to size and very comfortable. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Phillips

customer_reviews.title: nice shoe, but no support for standing on your ...
customer_reviews.text: I returned these, bought the exact same pair at the same time from another shoe place online, so I kept the others cuz a few bucks cheaper, anyways, I wore them for less then a month and the sides are gone...no support..only where them for cutting the grass now...nice shoe, but no support for standing on your feet all day or walking, my heels were killing me
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great, comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: As previous reviews mentioned, it’s important to go up a half size than a typical shoe. I had been wearing a different style of Sketchers and was pleased these fit the same way.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia G.

customer_reviews.title: Love them except a tad to small
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 71/2 because that is what I ordered when I bought another pair. For some reason this shoe is a tad smaller and one of my toes seem cramped. If I bought an 8 they would be too big I love them and hopefully they might stretch shortly
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Although very comfortable, for some reason I can’t keep them on. The laces don’t lace tightly enough and they slip off my heel. A smaller size would be too small. I am sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: Gin

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe. This is my second pair (the first pair is getting really old lol). It is so comfy and so easy to slip on. Great support and looks good for a long, long time.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser22

customer_reviews.title: My second pair
customer_reviews.text: I've been having foot problems and my Sketcher foam sneakers feel better on my feet than any of my other shoes. So this is a replacement pair for a pair I bought about a year ago. I like that they slip on and off without having to tie laces. They also come in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: msasser

customer_reviews.title: 2nd pair
customer_reviews.text: This was my 2nd purchase of this style and I am disappointed that they are too tight across toe area and I paid to have them stretched and no success.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Started with a 7.5 went to an 8
customer_reviews.text: I have several sketchers shoes.. I own a two styles similar this white one ( 7.5 and 8.0) . I normally wear an 8. I first bought the 7.5 white and had to exchange for the 8.0. All Sketchers are wonderful! 8.0 fits much better
customer_reviews.author: Jo Babe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect light weight shoe
customer_reviews.text: As always with sketchers, these are amazing light weight, comfortable, and true to size. Everything you expect from sketchers. I will repurchase when these eventually wear out or if I want different colors
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love Sketchers. The tread on these are better and last longer than other style Sketchers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love them. I also notice that with these memory ...
customer_reviews.text: I love them. I also notice that with these memory foam styles, you may need to go up half size more. I wear a 7.5 only for the comfort of no squishy toes or swollen feet in the warmer weather...with the memory foam styles, I find a size 8 is ideal...
customer_reviews.author: Miette's Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect brand
customer_reviews.text: I hate to admit that I only recently discovered Sketchers. I was tired of the need to replace my shoes all the time. I’m on my feet grooming dogs all day & these are the most comfortable shoes I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Skechers are the best!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these shoes in 2017 and wore them out. I have been looking for them for months. They are so comfortable and I love the fact that they are all white. You can put them in the washing machine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE These shoes!
customer_reviews.text: They are extremely light and airy...keeping my feet cool. Arch support is great and when I wear them I end up walking faster! I wear them for golf as well because frankly, I hate golf shoes. They are great summer shoes - easy on and off too!
customer_reviews.author: Peach

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for walking.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair and intend to buy again. great shoe for walking. i walk 5mi. a day and never have any foot problems. I put in washer & then dry in sun.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, very comfortable, fit well. This is not my first pair.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a favor!
customer_reviews.text: Have you ever imagined what it would feel like to walk on air? That's what these shoes feel like. I normally wear a 6.5 and I do agree that you should order a half-size up. I took the advice of other reviews I had read and ordered the 7 and they fit perfectly. I will update this review after I have been able to put some miles on these shoes but my initial thoughts are these are going to be my go-to walking shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Ness W.

customer_reviews.title: another comfy sketcher
customer_reviews.text: Once again they cameon time & fit just like I expected them too because I have many sketchers & styles all the same size which is thumbs up for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia M Collard

customer_reviews.title: Love not having to lace them up!
customer_reviews.text: These size 9 Skechers fit perfectly and are great for the gym or walking---any exercise. I think they have discontinued them so I'm glad I found them.
customer_reviews.author: cstamper

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable shoe I have ever worn. I can wear them all day, walk long distances, slip them on quickly; they are like little pillows surrounding my feet. My favorite shoe of all time.
customer_reviews.author: Cinthia

customer_reviews.title: The quality is horrible so I assume these were probably counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: I have bought and worn these exact shoes from an actual Skechers location and they were fabulous and lasted a few years. These however are already worn badly and getting holes in both sides where my big toe is. The quality is horrible so I assume these were probably counterfeit. I wish I would've noticed sooner that I only had a 30 day window to return them because I certainly would have. I've only had them for two months and only been wearing them for about half that time.
customer_reviews.author: Chalisa Bracken

customer_reviews.title: As Described
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes!! I am a Skechers brat lol I wont wear anything but Skechers. They are as expected and SUPER comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Great fit! Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I have flat feet and I find this style works well for me. I had a pair in wide but found after a period of time they got to loose. I plan to buy more colors soon!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: They run very small and are don't appear to be too small when trying them on, but hurt the toes.
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in my Skechers Sport Women's Gratis Bungees. I previously purchased a pair that seemed to fit at the time and they were too small. I then order a pair from Amazon a size larger and they too were too small. They hurt my feet so bad that I through them away. I have worn Skechers sneakers and shoes for years and never had a problem. I guess I'll stick to buying my shoes at the store where I can try them on, even if they cost me a little more. I spent $70.00 + on Skechers and have nothing to show for them. Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane A.

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: I bought these back in May and I haven't even wore these a dozen times. I was at work walking and in soul get funny on the toe. I came in glued. I bought some glue toe fix the soul. Later that day I noticed the heal was coming apart also. Very poorly made
customer_reviews.author: Becky King

customer_reviews.title: My favorite walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: My third pair - I love these shoes. I walk in them until the soles wear out. I hope Sketchers never discontinues this style....
customer_reviews.author: LKQH

customer_reviews.title: Great, no laces!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Had to get another pair. I bought this same pair 4 years ago and wore them often to work. When they started showing their age, I hoped I would find the same ones. Glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Sorella Luna

customer_reviews.title: So Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love this style of Skechers! I wore out my other white pair in 14 months. I clean them with 409 cleaner when dirty & put them in the washer with heavy towels to clean. Pretreat stains first. No dryer. I set them in the sunshine outside for the sun to bleach them whiter & dry!
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Was wider than my white ones
customer_reviews.text: I have this shoe in white and I love it! I ordered a black pair and was a little disappointed that they are a little wider than my white ones. I have a narrow heel and have difficulty finding shoes that fit properly. I get Skechers a half size smaller than I would normally wear and that usually works for me. I will have to put an insole in these to make the heel fit and then they'll be a little short. They'll still work wearing for a short time. I love Skechers and wish they offered their shoes in a narrow width!!!
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: But I love whits shoes with all my summer clothes
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered 3 pair of these in the past 1 year, Because the netting on the toe part keeps getting holes after a few weeks of wearing them. Now I only wear them when I have an special Occasion . they can not be worn everyday. But I love whits shoes with all my summer clothes, Im looking for a different style now, VERY DISAPPOINTING !!!!
customer_reviews.author: THERESA NEHLS

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. This is the second time of my buying exactly this type of Sketchers. I’m really pleased with the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jola Olofinboba

customer_reviews.title: Comfy.....but didn't hold up!
customer_reviews.text: I onl gave these sneakers 2 stars because.....after about a month of wear they started to come apart between the sole and shoe. Also so easy to scuff.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, great fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit! I have the worst time finding shoes that fit and are comfortable. These are perfect for me. I usually buy wide width. A half size up fit me the best in these. Added bonus, no tying shoelaces!
customer_reviews.author: J. Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: Lose threads
customer_reviews.text: I have previously owned a pair of shoes like this, wore for about 3 years. The threads are coming out around the toe part of each shoe. Have only worn them for about 3 weeks now. They will never hold up!
customer_reviews.author: Mnolen

customer_reviews.title: little narrow my feet
customer_reviews.text: \Too tight had I had order a show stretcher, that maybe me not the shoe,, 1st pair I had were great, I was younger could break leather in. now I have alot feet pain, hopefully shoe will stretch, i just love them
customer_reviews.author: Robin Wilde

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had my shoes long, but they are so comfortable with the memory foam soles. They fit perfect and look great. I'm going to order another pair before these go out of style or something happens that the company changes them.
customer_reviews.author: Iona F.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Had to order half size larger than usual but they are htrat... very comfortable ordered 2 pair... I love this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: dottie

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of this particular style of sketchers. They fit great, are very comfortable and clean up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are fabulous!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They fit perfectly. They are super comfortable. These are the first slip on tennis shoes I’ve ever had and I love them! Just pull them on. No more shoestrings to tie.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Pair Of Shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is my fifth pair of Sketchers, always a great fit
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for daily wear.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair of this style. They are great for daily wear. My only problem with them is my big toe on one foot wears a hole in the mesh. Would love to see the leather extend higher across the front.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: CAN'T GO WRONG WITH SKECHERS
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth pair of the Gratis sneaker. Love them! So comfortable. Like walking on air. Fits true to size and would definitely recommend. Great for long walks and every day wear.
customer_reviews.author: skully

customer_reviews.title: I am not buying skechers no more
customer_reviews.text: Every product from skechers is a different size. Different shoes different sizing...tired gave up on Skechers...
customer_reviews.author: Aki

customer_reviews.title: Wore for 1 month and
customer_reviews.text: After about a month, the inside of the big toe started coming apart at the seam. I used a glue gun, and now both shoes are blowing out at the inside big toe seam. The shoes aren't tight in any way, and fit very comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: scubadoo

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoes!
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth pair of Skechers and I absolutely love them! They are the most comfortable shoes. I would and do recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tn2MIlady

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, pretty and make my feet look smaller!
customer_reviews.text: Love these for comfort, style and fit. Not to bulky, I wanted a sneaker that blended with cropped summer jeans. I have big feet and sometimes sneakers call attention to themselves. With a size 9, I want my feet to look smaller not bigger! These help!
customer_reviews.author: Book Lady

customer_reviews.title: Comfort is key
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the most comfortable shoe I have ever worn. So comfy that my MIL wanted a pair just like them, so I bought two!!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Williams

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: This my 4 th pair in 5 years. Use my first one for yard work now. Perfect for airport security checks fast to slip off/ and no no laces black for winter white for summer
customer_reviews.author: G  G

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Really like the shoes, just seem to be a bit tight! Never had to worry about a width issue before, but all shoes are made differently! I have bought Sketchers before and will continue to!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!!!
customer_reviews.text: Had purchased this shoe at a store a few years back....have worn it out!!!! Was given a gift card for AMAZON recently and so I thought I would use it to order another pair just like it.....well, I got it so quickly in the mail and it fits perfectly!!! Great Shoe! Thanks for great service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sketchers are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: The sketchers are very comfortable. I wash mine in the washer and they come out beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: PAIN!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes specifically because I have foot pain and these were the shoes I could wear last summer. As it turns out, it was these shoes that caused the paid all along. This may not be an issue for others, but for me it caused the worst foot pain of my life.
customer_reviews.author: sarah cook

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: A fresh pair of white sneaks, for running around this city, sleek enough for my long skirts!
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve O. Joseph

product_meta.title: Skechers Gratis - Going Place, Women's Gratis-Going Places
